strengths.content: teaching method created two different styles
various instructional methods were identified and used in the lesson
students were actively involved during the lesson
assessment provides the opportunity to demonstrate mastery of the skills taught

weakness.content: the lesson did not go as planned as time ran out due to extended discussions enable students to grasp the concept
learning environment was not adequately prepared
assessment activity did not measure what was practiced and taught
no summary of the lesson or wrap up occurred
objectives did not define what students would be able to do

wayForward.content: modify content although more discussion and student involvement in lesson
incorporate other teaching learning strategies to make lesson more interesting
provide assessment activities for various learning styles
ensure objectives clearly states what student would be able to do at the end of the lesson
plan lesson that incorporates use of fears resources
